content.rendered:
Directed by Shonali Bose.

Written by Shonali Bose. Juhi Chaturvedi. Nilesh Maniyar.

Cast Priyanka Chopra Jonas(Aditi Chaudhary (as Priyanka Chopra)). Farhan Akhtar(Niren Chaudhary). Zaira Wasim(Aisha Chaudhary). Rohit Saraf(Ishaan Chaudhary). Manas Mittal(Anshu Tandon). Rajshri Deshpande(Anita Tandon). Lushin Dubey(Mrs. Tandon). Sunil Chitkara(Mr. Chaudhary). Nirupama Verma(Mrs. Chaudhary). Puja Sarup(Mohini (as Pooja Swaroop)). Jayesh Patil(Camera department 5th assistant). Gurpal Singh(RJ Arjun GIll). Sheena Khalid(Rita). Ishan Jotshi(Karan). Sudhanva Deshpande(Dr. Nirvik Gulati). Manisha Chudasama(Santoshi). Paras Rattan Sharda(Jeet). Salmin Sheriff(Dr. Batliwala). Rishi Deshpande(Tanya’s Doctor). Mala Hashmi(Christian Woman). Akshay Joshi(Store Assistant). Nargis Nandal(Pilot). Raabiya Marici(Ishaan’s Girlfriend). Nikita Grover(Bathroom Attendant). Noor Mishayel Dubey Nundy(Christmas Party Girl). Saira Majithia(Aisha’s Cousin). Aparajita Dey(Tina Tandon). Surajit Nundy(Niren’s Friend). Sanjay Chopra(Niren’s Uncle). Neelam Sharma(Niren’s Aunt). Anish Trivedi(Mr. Tandon). Dhananjay Kapoor(Mohini’s Husband) . 

Language Hindi.

Producers Ajay Arora. Ankita Batra. Nancy Nisa Beso. Priyanka Chopra Jonas. Atul Vinod Duggal. Robert Friedland. Deepak Gawade. Vikram Nath Gupta. Michael Hogan. Pashan Jal. Marie C. James. Salona Bains Joshi. Sonia Kanwar. Siddharth Roy Kapur. Kilian Kerwin. Saurabh Khandelwal. Malvika Khatri.

Production Ivanhoe Pictures. Purple Pebble Pictures. RSV.
